rules_text:
When Vagabond of the Dunes enters, each opponent discards a card.
Whenever an opponent discards a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Vagabond of the Dunes.
Surpass {5}{B} [i]({5}{B}: Transform this creature. This costs {1} less to activate for each counter[/i]
[i]on it. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Menace
Each opponent’s maximum hand size is reduced by the number of counters on Fahrib’s Lieutenant.
Whenever an opponent discards a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Fahrib’s Lieutenant.
